mainText:
He has been an alchemist..the ones that FOUND his treasure; The true Inner
treasure.
He is a fighter,innovator and a role-model in many aspects of life.

I hope "death" would be the ending point of a life and the start of a better
one for you steve,
Rest in peace.
header: Sry for humanity's loss for the century!
author: Mennatallah
